data.title: Nice Mom and Pop
data.text: if you like real Mom and Pop restaurants, this will make you smile. The food is good, the salsa is very good, the portions are large and the lunch specials are reasonable. Not a romantic dinner spot but for a good meal you will not leave hungry from, its a good spot. Service is like family because it is family. Nice people.

data.title: Good. homemade Mexican Food
data.text:
Jose and his wife do everything here.  The food is made fresh, to your order, served piping hot and always with a smile.  This is a budget friendly gem for lunch or early dinner.  They close at six.  Also have take out and catering service.  El Nopal serves beer and wine, many Mexican specialty sodas and the usual USA brands, as well as hot or iced tea or coffee.

Jose is always ready to customize your order.  I particularly like a small burrito with the works:  sour cream, guacamole and hot peppers.  It's the Super Burrito in mini version.  Give El Nopal a try you're in downtown Vallejo or environs.  Closed Saturday and Sunday.
